article_title: Gaza ceasefire talks resume as Rafah under fire
Gaza ceasefire talks resume as Rafah under fire
sentence: At  least  1,200  people  were  killed  during  the  Hamas-led  attacks.

article_title: Gaza ceasefire talks resume as Rafah under fire
sentence: Some  28,473  Palestinians  have  been  killed  and  more  than  68,000  wounded  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry  there.
